FAQs

What is the fabric composition?

It’s a tri-blend of linen, cotton, and lyocell balanced to keep the natural linen texture while improving softness, comfort, and structure.

Does it wrinkle?

Yes, like all natural-feel fabrics, it will crease a little. But the difference is: the wrinkles look softer and more relaxed, not sharp and messy.

Is it soft on sensitive skin?

It’s engineered to be gentler on skin compared to many traditional linens, because the blend is made to reduce that crisp, rough feel.

What if the size doesn’t fit?

We offer 7-day easy returns & exchanges.
